text.section: A public service company shall file with the Commission a tariff schedule of its rates and charges for its regulated services and for standard offer service as provided in § 7-505(b)(8) of this article.

As ordered by the Commission, a public service company shall:
plainly print the tariff schedule of its rates and charges for its regulated services;
make available the tariff schedules for public inspection; and
post the tariff schedules to make the tariff schedules readily accessible to and convenient for inspection by the public.
